rule.name: HighRiskTmxReasons
rule.description: (TMX Summary Reason Code = 'Device_Negative_History') AND (TMX Summary Reason Code = 'Identity_Negative_History') AND (TMX Summary Reason Code = 'IP_Spoofing') AND (TMX Summary Reason Code = 'GEO_Spoofing') AND (TMX Summary Reason Code = 'Bot') AND (TMX Summary Reason Code = 'Identity_Spoofing')

rule.name: Regextest2
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^[^aeiou]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z0-9]{2,4}$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: Regextest1
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^[a-z]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z0-9]{2,4}$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: Regex3
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^.{7,}\@.*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: CC
rule.description: (Condition Attribute 4 = 'pldg_adyn') OR (Condition Attribute 4 = 'pldg_strp')

rule.name: Low Risk
rule.description: (Policy Score > '10')

ifRule.name: CC_tester
ifRule.description: Logic Type: AND; Dependencies: [object RuleInstance],[object RuleInstance],[object RuleInstance],[object RuleInstance],[object RuleInstance]

rule.name: OFAC
rule.description: Match Countries: CU|SD|IR|SY|KP

rule.name: LowFraudreasonCombo
rule.description: (Transaction Amount < '25') AND (True IP City = Ship Address City)

rule.name: IPWhitelisted
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: whitelist; Attribute: True IP

rule.name: ExactIDWhitelisted
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: whitelist; Attribute: Exact ID

rule.name: SmartIDWhitelisted
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: whitelist; Attribute: Smart ID

rule.name: NoDeviceID
rule.description: (Exact ID is absent ) OR (Smart ID is absent )

rule.name: ExactIDBlacklisted
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: blacklist; Attribute: Exact ID

rule.name: SmartIDBlacklisted
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: blacklist; Attribute: Smart ID

rule.name: IPBlacklisted
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: blacklist; Attribute: True IP

rule.name: SmartIDValid
rule.description: (Smart ID Confidence > '90') OR (Smart ID Confidence < '100')

rule.name: ExactIDInvalid
rule.description: (Exact ID Match Result != 'success')

rule.name: TimeSpentUnder15sec
rule.description: (Time spent on page <= '15000')

rule.name: TimeSpentUnder30sec
rule.description: (Time spent on page <= '30000')

rule.name: EmailMoreThan3Numbers
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^([^0-9_]*[0-9_]{4,10})\@.*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: EMailNameWithNonLetters
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^([^0-9_]*[0-9_]){1,}\@.*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: EMail Name Too Long
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^.{20,}\@.*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: EMailHostnamewithNonLetters
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^.*\@([^0-9]*[0-9]){4,}.*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: EMailHostnameTooLong
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^.*\@([^0-9]*[0-9]){4,}.*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: EmailDomainNoVowels
rule.description: Attribute: Account Email; Regular Expression: ^,"\@^[^aeiou].*$; Case Sensitive: no

rule.name: PossibleVPNConnection
rule.description: Attribute: True IP Organization; Regular Expression: .*(vpn|VPN)( .+)?|AnchorFree; Case Sensitive: yes

rule.name: DeviceNegativeReputation
rule.description: List Type: blacklist

rule.name: HiddenProxy
rule.description: Proxy Type: hidden

rule.name: AnonymousProxy
rule.description: Proxy Type: anonymous

rule.name: 3ProxyPerDeviceDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Global; Primary Attribute: Exact ID; Secondary Attribute: Proxy IP; Threshold: 3

rule.name: 6EmailPerDevice
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Smart ID; Secondary Attribute: Email; Threshold: 6

rule.name: 5EmailPerDevice
rule.description: Time Frame: Month; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Smart ID; Secondary Attribute: Email; Threshold: 5

rule.name: 4EmailPerDevice
rule.description: Time Frame: Month; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Smart ID; Secondary Attribute: Email; Threshold: 4

rule.name: 3EmailPerDevice
rule.description: Time Frame: Month; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Smart ID; Secondary Attribute: Email; Threshold: 3

rule.name: DeviceCountriesNotAllowed
rule.description: Scope: Local; List Type: blacklist; Attribute: True IP Geo

rule.name: AnonymousProxy
rule.description: (Proxy Type is absent ) AND (True IP Geo = 'A1')

rule.name: SatelliteISP
rule.description: (True IP Geo = 'A2')

rule.name: SatelliteProxyISP
rule.description: (Proxy Type != 'hidden') AND (Proxy IP Geo = 'A2')

rule.name: PossibleCookieWiping
rule.description: Time Frame: Hour; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Smart ID; Secondary Attribute: Exact ID; Threshold: 3

rule.name: BogonProxy
rule.description: (Proxy IP Trust Tags contains 'BOGON')

rule.name: DialupProxy
rule.description: (Proxy IP Organization contains 'dialup') OR (Proxy IP Organization contains 'dial up') OR (Proxy IP Organization contains 'dial-up') OR (Proxy IP Organization contains 'dial-in') OR (Proxy IP Organization contains 'dial in') OR (Proxy IP Organization contains 'dial-pool')

ifRule.name: UnusualProxyAttributes
ifRule.description: Logic Type: OR; Dependencies: [object RuleInstance],[object RuleInstance]

rule.name: Dial-upConnection
rule.description: (True IP Organization contains 'dialup') OR (True IP Organization contains 'dial up') OR (True IP Organization contains 'dial-up') OR (True IP Organization contains 'dial-in') OR (True IP Organization contains 'dial in') OR (True IP Organization contains 'dial-pool')

rule.name: 2DevicePayment
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Entity Type: Exact ID; Event Type: Payment; History Depth: 100; Threshold: 5

rule.name: DistanceTraveledOver500Miles
rule.description: Source: IP Geo; Time Frame: Day; Scope: Global; Entity Type: Exact ID; Threshold: 500; Units: miles

rule.name: DistanceTraveled250Miles
rule.description: Source: IP Geo; Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Entity Type: Smart ID; Threshold: 250; Units: miles

rule.name: DistanceTraveled50Miles
rule.description: Source: IP Geo; Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Entity Type: Smart ID; Threshold: 50; Units: miles

rule.name: GlobalEMailOver6Month
rule.description: Time Source: Entity First Seen; Source Entity: Email; Comparison: >; Threshold: 6 Months

rule.name: GobalEmailOver3Month
rule.description: Time Source: Entity First Seen; Source Entity: Email; Comparison: >; Threshold: 3 Months

rule.name: GlobalEMailOverOneMonth
rule.description: Time Source: Entity First Seen; Source Entity: Email; Comparison: >; Threshold: 1 Month

rule.name: OpenProxy
rule.description: Proxy Type: open

rule.name: TransparentProxy
rule.description: Proxy Type: transparent

rule.name: ProxyTrueOrganizationMismatch
rule.description: (Proxy IP Organization != True IP Organization) AND (Proxy IP Organization is_present ) AND (True IP Organization is_present )

rule.name: ProxyTrueISPMismatch
rule.description: (Proxy IP ISP = True IP ISP) AND (Proxy IP ISP is_present ) AND (True IP ISP is_present )

rule.name: ProxyTrueRegionMismatch
rule.description: (True IP Region != Proxy IP Region) AND (True IP Region is_present ) AND (Proxy IP Region is_present )

rule.name: ProxyTrueCityMismatch
rule.description: (Proxy IP City != True IP City) AND (Proxy IP City is_present ) AND (True IP City is_present )

rule.name: TransactionValueDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Entity Type: Exact ID; Event Type: All; Operator: >; Threshold: 100.00; Currency: USD (US dollar)

rule.name: FlashImagesCookiesDisabled
rule.description: (Flash Enabled = 'no') AND (Images Enabled = 'no') AND (Cookies Enabled = 'no')

rule.name: FlashCookiesDisabled
rule.description: (Flash Enabled = 'no') AND (Cookies Enabled = 'no')

rule.name: ImagesDisabled
rule.description: (Images Enabled = 'no')

rule.name: CookiesDisabled
rule.description: (Cookies Enabled = 'no')

rule.name: FlashDisabled
rule.description: (Flash Enabled = 'no')

rule.name: HIghRiskCountry
rule.description: Match Countries: GH|BJ|CI|CO|PK|VN|TN

rule.name: MediumRiskCountry
rule.description: Match Countries: NG|GE|EG|LT|VE|MX|BG|KE|EE|PH|SA|RU|PE|RO|IN

rule.name: LowRiskCountry
rule.description: Match Countries: JP|NZ|TW|SK

rule.name: Shipping Address Exists
rule.description: (Ship Address City is_present )

rule.name: IPRegionMisMatch
rule.description: (True IP Region != Ship Address State)

rule.name: IPShipStateMatch
rule.description: (True IP Region = Ship Address State)

rule.name: TimeZoneAnomaly
rule.description: (Time Zone Offset Anomaly = 'yes')

rule.name: ScreenResAnomaly
rule.description: (Screen Res Anomaly = 'yes')

rule.name: MacOS
rule.description: (UA OS contains 'macosx') OR (UA OS contains 'Intel Mac OS 10_6_6') OR (UA OS contains 'Intel Mac OS X 10.8') OR (UA OS contains 'Intel Mac OS X 10_8_2')

rule.name: Windows
rule.description: (UA OS contains 'win')

rule.name: 8ContributionPerDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Exact ID; Secondary Attribute: Smart ID; Event Type: Payment; Threshold: 8

rule.name: 7ContributionPerDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Exact ID; Secondary Attribute: Smart ID; Event Type: Payment; Threshold: 7

rule.name: 6ContributionPerDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Exact ID; Secondary Attribute: Smart ID; Event Type: Payment; Threshold: 6

rule.name: 5ContributionPerDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Exact ID; Secondary Attribute: Smart ID; Event Type: Payment; Threshold: 5

rule.name: 4ContributionPerDay
rule.description: Time Frame: Day; Scope: Local; Primary Attribute: Exact ID; Secondary Attribute: Account Password; Event Type: Payment; Threshold: 4

rule.name: StudentEmail
rule.description: (Account Email contains '.edu')

rule.name: Softsign
rule.description: (Account Email contains 'softsign_')

rule.name: IGGEmail
rule.description: (Account Email contains '@indiegogo.com')

rule.name: BusinessEmail
rule.description: (Account Email contains '.org') OR (Account Email contains '.gov') OR (Account Email contains '.mil')

rule.name: FreeEmail
rule.description: (Account Email contains 'yahoo.com') OR (Account Email contains 'gmail.com') OR (Account Email contains 'hotmail.com')

rule.name: NoShipAddress
rule.description: (Ship Address State is absent ) AND (Ship Address Street1 is absent ) AND (Ship Address Zip is absent ) AND (Ship Address Country is absent ) AND (Condition Attribute 5 != 'untitled draft project')

rule.name: ShipAddressPresent
rule.description: (Ship Address City is_present ) AND (Ship Address Country is_present ) AND (Ship Address Street1 is_present ) AND (Ship Address Zip is_present )

rule.name: UntitledCampaignContribution
rule.description: (Condition Attribute 5 = 'untitled draft project') AND (Transaction Amount != 0)

rule.name: CC
rule.description: (Condition Attribute 4 = 'pldg_adyn')

rule.name: Paypal
rule.description: (Condition Attribute 4 = 'pldg_payp')

rule.description: Threshold: 2; Currency: USD (US dollar); Operator: <

rule.description: Threshold: 25; Currency: USD (US dollar); Operator: <
